Well, it could be that APM is turned off in the BIOS, or like bob2 said, your BIOS could be ACPI-compliant
There are 2 types of power management used by PCs:  APM and ACPI
so how can i know which type does my computer use?
Check in your BIOS..... Usually there will be a place where you can turn on APM/ACPI.....That will tell you which one you have
looks as if your power management has been turned off in the BIOS
